OOC: Not related, merely a well known figure in history who knew 
someone related to my char. Just as an additional info, they are 
really trustworthy, and if you could agree with them, it'd be great!

Gogolan:
Let us just tell you you may be someone crucial in the history of 
Cybertron and all Transformer space... that is, if we can get the 
timeline back to its normal course... We do not ask you to become that 
person if you do not want to, we only need the help of all 
transformers here to correct the mistakes of Transwarp technology.

Ramiel:
By the way, there is not much chance you know my grandmother by now... 
I doubt she is even online by now. She has known, or more accurately 
will have known you merely two centuries before your death. But, 
please, understand our duty. We HAVE to set time back the way it was. 
We can fight with you, should you need our help, but we would prefer 
to arrive to a peaceful agreement between everyone on Earth, do you 
understand?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "RYO D" <striderzero1@h...> wrote:
> OCC: For the all that is holy in the universe please do not try to 
say were

> ::Liono::

care for 
> stories. If I am talked about in the future let them speak of the 
days when 
> I was a evil just as well as the days that I was good and let 
mortals judge 
> me accordingly for my good and evil deeds." Liono refolds his arms 
"I am 
> that is!" Liono calmly laughs "If your grandmother told my story 
correct you 
> should understand that with out question."
